title: kaaruNya kandha
sahitya:
kAruNya kanda gAnAmudam santatam tA vA



anupallavi



pArEzhODEzhumE pugazh pAgAr paN tamizhinil mighu



caraNam



dhavaLa kamala vAsini taraLa mAmaNi bhUSaNi dhavaLa mAlini dhavaLAmbari
vAni dhavaLa mA mati
pOlum vadana dhavaLa mEni minnAL nin aruLAl saraLa kavi kunjaradAsan ennAvil
ninrinidE Urip-peruga
